oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Supreme Court Building, 1961 September 08
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Tennessee Supreme Court building, located at Charlotte Avenue and 7th Avenue, was designed by Marr and Holman and built by Rock City Construction. It took over 18 months to build and was completed in 1937 as part of the Works Project Administration. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Supreme Court--History--Sources
